languages.text: "Нет!" {n}Щеки Ардженты заливает яростный румянец.{/n} "Я — одна из {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g}, вестница заветов {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, и я не лгу! Я..." {n}Она переводит дух.{/n} "Раньше я не готова была говорить с вами откровенно".

traits.locale_text: "Нет!" {n}Щеки Ардженты заливает яростный румянец.{/n} "Я — одна из {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g}, вестница заветов {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, и я не лгу! Я..." {n}Она переводит дух.{/n} "Раньше я не готова была говорить с вами откровенно".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "No!" {n}Argenta's cheeks redden with indignation.{/n} "I am one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}, a bearer of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s tenets, and I do not lie! I..." {n}She catches her breath.{/n} "Before, I wasn't ready to speak candidly with you."
languages.original_text: "Нет!" {n}Щеки Ардженты заливает яростный румянец.{/n} "Я — одна из {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g}, вестница заветов {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, и я не лгу! Я..." {n}Она переводит дух.{/n} "Раньше я не готова была говорить с вами откровенно".

I..." {n}She catches her breath.{/n} "Before, I wasn't ready to speak candidly with you."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “没有！”{n}阿洁塔愤怒地涨红了脸。{/n}“我是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修女会{/g}的成员，是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}信条的传承之人，我从不撒谎！我……”{n}她喘了口气。{/n}“我之前只是还没有准备好与你坦诚相见。”
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Argenta's cheeks redden with indignation.{/n} "I am one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}, a bearer of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s tenets, and I do not lie! I..." {n}She catches her breath.{/n} "Before, I wasn't ready to speak candidly with you."

traits.locale_text: “没有！”{n}阿洁塔愤怒地涨红了脸。{/n}“我是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修女会{/g}的成员，是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}信条的传承之人，我从不撒谎！我……”{n}她喘了口气。{/n}“我之前只是还没有准备好与你坦诚相见。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡No!». {n}Argenta se sonroja, indignada.{/n} «Soy miembro del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}, seguidora de la doctrina del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}, ¡y nunca miento! Yo...». {n}Se detiene para coger aliento.{/n} «No estaba lista para sincerarme con usted antes de ahora».
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Argenta's cheeks redden with indignation.{/n} "I am one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}, a bearer of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s tenets, and I do not lie! I..." {n}She catches her breath.{/n} "Before, I wasn't ready to speak candidly with you."

traits.locale_text: «¡No!». {n}Argenta se sonroja, indignada.{/n} «Soy miembro del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}, seguidora de la doctrina del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}, ¡y nunca miento! Yo...». {n}Se detiene para coger aliento.{/n} «No estaba lista para sincerarme con usted antes de ahora».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「違う！」{n}アルジェンタの頬が憤怒で赤く染まる。{/n}「我は{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修道聖女会{/g}の一員であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の教義を伝える者だ！我は嘘などつかない！我は…」{n}彼女は息を止める。{/n}「以前は、御身とまっすぐに話す準備ができていなかったのです」
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Argenta's cheeks redden with indignation.{/n} "I am one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}, a bearer of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s tenets, and I do not lie! I..." {n}She catches her breath.{/n} "Before, I wasn't ready to speak candidly with you."

traits.locale_text: 「違う！」{n}アルジェンタの頬が憤怒で赤く染まる。{/n}「我は{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修道聖女会{/g}の一員であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の教義を伝える者だ！我は嘘などつかない！我は…」{n}彼女は息を止める。{/n}「以前は、御身とまっすぐに話す準備ができていなかったのです」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Nein!" {n}Argentas Wangen werden rot vor Entrüstung.{/n} "Ich gehöre zur {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}, ich folge den Grundsätzen des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, und ich lüge nicht! Ich ..." {n}Sie holt Luft.{/n} "Ich konnte bisher nicht offen mit Euch sprechen."
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Argenta's cheeks redden with indignation.{/n} "I am one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}, a bearer of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s tenets, and I do not lie! I..." {n}She catches her breath.{/n} "Before, I wasn't ready to speak candidly with you."

traits.locale_text: "Nein!" {n}Argentas Wangen werden rot vor Entrüstung.{g|Encyclopedia: "Ich gehöre zur }AdeptaSororitas{/g}Adepta Sororitas{/n}, ich folge den Grundsätzen des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, und ich lüge nicht! Ich ..." {n}Sie holt Luft.{/n} "Ich konnte bisher nicht offen mit Euch sprechen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Non ! {n}s'exclame Argenta en rougissant d'indignation.{/n} En tant que membre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}, je prêche la doctrine de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} et je ne mens jamais ! Je... » {n}Elle s'interrompt un instant pour reprendre son souffle.{/n} « Seulement, je n'étais pas encore prête à vous parler à cœur ouvert. »
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Argenta's cheeks redden with indignation.{/n} "I am one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}, a bearer of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s tenets, and I do not lie! I..." {n}She catches her breath.{/n} "Before, I wasn't ready to speak candidly with you."

traits.locale_text: « Non ! {n}s'exclame Argenta en rougissant d'indignation.{/n} En tant que membre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}, je prêche la doctrine de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} et je ne mens jamais ! Je... » {n}Elle s'interrompt un instant pour reprendre son souffle.{/n} « Seulement, je n'étais pas encore prête à vous parler à cœur ouvert. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Hayır!" {n}Argenta'nın yüzü, öfkeden kıpkırmızı kesiliyor.{/n} "Ben {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} mensubuyum, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} ilkelerinin hizmetkârıyım! Ben yalan söylemem! Ben..." {n}Bir anlığına soluklanıyor.{/n} "Sana karşı samimi olup olamayacağımdan emin değildim."
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Argenta's cheeks redden with indignation.{/n} "I am one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}, a bearer of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s tenets, and I do not lie! I..." {n}She catches her breath.{/n} "Before, I wasn't ready to speak candidly with you."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır!" {n}Argenta'nın yüzü, öfkeden kıpkırmızı kesiliyor.{/n} "Ben, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} üyelerinden biriyim, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un ilkelerinin hizmetkârıyım! Ben yalan söylemem! Ben…" {n}Bir anlığına soluklanıyor.{/n} "Sana karşı samimi olup olamayacağımdan emin değildim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
